sentences: Hän hieroi minun olkavarteeni ja olkavarrenivelteni väliin.
context: The Finnish word 'olkapää' refers to the shoulder area of the human body, specifically the upper part of the arm where it connects to the torso. It is a common noun used in everyday language when discussing anatomy, injuries, or clothing that fits around this area. The word can be used in both singular and plural forms (olkapäät).
